channel.title: What am i doing wrong?

item.title: What am i doing wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

You need more closing braces.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 44) {
    if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
        npcs[i].textUpdate = "WARNING,NUCLEAR LAUNCH DETECTED";
    }
}

item.title: What am i doing wrong?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

im trying to add this speech to one of my npcs, but i get 7 errors, i did this with other npcs, it worked! but i get this compiler error:

http://img832.imageshack.us/content_round.php?page=done&l=img832/7161/captureaqs.png&via=mupload

what am i doing wrong? the code and everything around it:

} if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true) { npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement(); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 44) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WARNING,NUCLEAR LAUNCH DETECTED"; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 237) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WARNING,LEAVING HOME AFTER THIS POINT!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 594) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Pickaxe,Axe Shop!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 576) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Special Random Stuff!"; }

the code which i get an error is the second code: (the npc id is 44)
